Package api

Class DWGraph_DS

java.lang.Object
api.DWGraph_DS
All Implemented Interfaces:
directed_weighted_graph
public class DWGraph_DS
extends java.lang.Object
implements directed_weighted_graph
Graph_DS implements the directed_weighted_graph interface and represents the Graph structure all nodes in the graph are stores in HashMap and the edges are stores in double HashMap the edgeSize is counting within add\remove edges methods The modCount is increase on each method that changes something in the graph

    checks if the both nodes are in graph (otherwise one of them will be null), checks that the nodes are different and checks that the node are not connected yet if node connected do update if all checks are passed then add src to dest (directed graph)

    • connect

      public void connect​(int src, int dest, double w)
      checks if the both nodes are in graph (otherwise one of them will be null), checks that the nodes are different and checks that the node are not connected yet if node connected do update if all checks are passed then add src to dest (directed graph)
      Specified by:
      connect in interface directed_weighted_graph
      Parameters:
      src - - the source of the edge.
      dest - - the destination of the edge.
      w - - positive weight representing the cost (aka time, price, etc) between src-->dest.
